description: Enterprise techniques used by Water Galura, ATT&CK group G1050 (v1.0)
name: Water Galura (G1050)

techniques.comment: [Water Galura](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1050) has encrypted files on victim networks through the generation of [Qilin](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1242) ransomware payloads.(Citation: BushidoToken Qilin RaaS JUN 2024)

[Water Galura](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1050) operates a news channel on Telegram to make announcements for the [Qilin](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1242) RaaS.(Citation: BushidoToken Qilin RaaS JUN 2024)

[Water Galura](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1050) has extorted victims for ransomware decryption keys and to prevent publication of data exfiltrated to their [Tor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0183) data leak site.(Citation: BushidoToken Qilin RaaS JUN 2024)(Citation: HC3 Qilin Threat Profile JUN 2024)
